articles.description: Bradford City have announced a League Two club record for season tickets, with the club having sold over 14,000 early-bird ‘Own The Moment’ season-ticket sales ahead of the 2022-23 campaign.
articles.content: Having gone on sale in mid-April, the early-bird period saw prices frozen from last season at adult prices of £198. The current figure of 14,036 beats Citys previous League Two season-ticket sales re… [+1950 chars]

articles.title: Tottenham step back from Christian Eriksen bid to focus on other signings - Daily Mail
articles.description: New United boss Erik ten Hag has made Eriksen one of his key transfer targets and the club have offered the 30-year-old a contract, which the player is considering.
articles.content:

articles.title: Gary Neville criticises the Glazers for taking £11million out of Manchester United in dividends - Daily Mail
articles.description: United's shareholders are in line to earn significant payouts after the club revealed their financial results. Neville believes that the Glazers shouldn't take any dividends for at least the next three years.
articles.content:
